I have a object which extends TestCase and works if I run the 
junit.textui.TestRunner - but I'd like to run it from inside a java class 
and get back the statistics - such as failure, success, and runtime.  Is 
there any way I can do this or am I fighting a loosing battle?

thanks

joe
subject: Question about running tests
